main event: A resident observed a large circle of red pulsating light from her window in Staten Island, New York for about five minutes.
interesting points: The observer reported the light drifting slowly in a southeastern direction., The light was described as a large circle with a pulsating red color., The sighting lasted around five minutes., The observer concluded that the object was the planet Venus., The report states that there were no photographs or physical evidence.
sighted object: a large circle of red pulsating light
witness description: a civilian resident observed the light from her window
